author: 茹行止
title: 一季度社会消费品零售总额同比增长4.6%--我国超大规模市场活力潜力进一步释放 _光明网
text:
点击右上角微信好友
朋友圈
点击浏览器下方“”分享微信好友Safari浏览器请点击“”按钮
光明日报北京4月23日电 记者董蓓从商务部获悉，今年以来，各级商务主管部门大力实施提振消费专项行动，加力扩围开展消费品以旧换新，扩大服务消费，创新消费场景，消费市场实现平稳开局，我国超大规模市场的活力潜力进一步释放。
数据显示，一季度，社会消费品零售总额12.47万亿元，同比增长4.6%，增速比上年全年加快1.1个百分点。其中，3月份增长5.9%。一季度，居民人均消费支出同比增长5.2%；最终消费支出拉动GDP增长2.8个百分点，对经济发展的基础性作用进一步巩固。
以旧换新成效明显，绿色智能产品销售快速增长。一季度，商品零售额同比增长4.6%，增速比上年全年加快1.4个百分点。限额以上单位商品零售额增长5.8%，增速比上年全年加快3.1个百分点。据汽车流通协会数据，一季度乘用车零售量同比增长5.8%，其中新能源乘用车零售量增长36.4%，渗透率达47.2%。3月份，部分重点监测企业智能家居产品销售额同比增长10%以上。
服务消费持续扩大，文娱旅游消费备受青睐。一季度，服务零售额同比增长5.0%，增速比商品零售额快0.4个百分点。其中，餐饮收入增长4.7%，增速比1至2月加快0.4个百分点，居民人均交通通信支出、教育文化娱乐支出均实现两位数增长。一季度全国电影票房244亿元，同比增长约48%，创历史新高。入境游热度不减，据国家移民管理局数据，自240小时过境免签政策实施以来，截至3月31日，全国各口岸入境外国人同比增长40.2%，其中免签入境占比达71.3%。
线上消费保持较快增长，实体零售呈现回升向好态势。一季度，网上零售额同比增长7.9%，其中实物商品网上零售额增长5.7%，占社零总额比重为24.0%。实体零售企业加快数字化转型，积极创新消费场景，提升消费体验，销售实现平稳增长。
商务部消费促进司负责人表示，随着各项扩消费政策措施持续发力，“购在中国”系列活动有序开展，人工智能等新技术加快在消费领域应用，消费市场有望继续呈现平稳发展态势，将为经济持续回升向好提供有力支撑。
《光明日报》（2025年04月24日 04版）
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->business reporting and performance

author: Irishexaminer.com (digitaldesk@irishexaminer.com)
title: Boy, four, who disappeared from camp found safe after 22 hours in wilderness
text:
A four-year-old California boy who wandered away from a campground in the Sierra National Forest was found safe after spending 22 hours alone in the wilderness, authorities said.
A search-and-rescue team of about 50 officers and volunteers set out around 11am on Thursday after the child was reported missing from the camping site surrounded by dense forest north of Fresno.
The boy, from Torrance near Los Angeles, was last seen wearing shorts and a T-shirt, the Fresno County Sheriff’s Office said.
Around 8am on Friday, the boy was discovered in good condition “nestled under a tree” near a lake about a quarter mile (0.4 km) from the Rancheria Campground where his family was.
“He was hungry and exhausted, but otherwise in good health. We got him a sandwich and then carried him out to be reunited with Mom and Dad,” the sheriff’s office said on Saturday.
Officials say the boy simply wandered away and lost his sense of direction.
The sheriff’s office thanked members of the public who volunteered to join the search, “kept their eyes peeled, spread the word on social media and sent prayers up”.
“All of this undoubtedly helped to bring (him) home safely,” the department said.

author: sina_mobile
title: 政企联动开展关爱女性健康行动_手机新浪网
text:
政企联动开展关爱女性健康行动
本报讯（熊纹玉）近日，四川省遂宁市船山区个体私营经济协会携手遂宁妇产医院，共同开展“关爱女性健康行动”，为83名女性会员提供妇科常规、乳腺超声、宫颈癌筛查等8大免费体检项目。
活动现场，遂宁妇产医院严格按照JCI国际医疗标准提供服务。
此次活动得到了女性会员的一致好评，展现了民营医疗机构的社会责任和担当。遂宁妇产医院相关负责人表示：“希望我们提供的免费体检能够帮助更多的女性，提高健康意识，降低疾病的危害。”
此次政企联动行动，是对《“健康中国2030”规划纲要》的积极响应。未来，遂宁市将继续深化政企合作，共同为百姓健康福祉贡献力量。

author: ABNewswire
title: Revolutionizing Industries: Naveen Kumar Shares Insights
text:
Revolutionizing Industries: Naveen Kumar Shares Insights on the Future of Business Innovation 04-02-2025 11:12 PM CET | Business, Economy, Finances, Banking & Insurance
Press release from: ABNewswire
Image: https://www.abnewswire.com/upload/2025/04/27f72ed18a923d4478622cf62464ef44.jpg
Host: Naveen, thank you for joining us. Your remarkable career has set benchmarks in AI, ERP, and CRM innovation. What first drew you to these transformative technologies?
Naveen Kumar: It's a pleasure to be here! My interest began with a fascination for solving complex, real-world problems through technology. Early on, I recognized the ability of ERP and CRM systems to revolutionize business operations. As AI and cloud computing advanced, I saw an opportunity to integrate these innovations into enterprise ecosystems-transforming challenges into opportunities for growth and efficiency. Every project has been an exciting journey of discovery and impact.
Host: Among your notable achievements, you've led major digital transformations. Could you share a project that truly defines your approach?
Naveen Kumar: Of course! One of my proudest projects was with a global consumer goods company dealing with outdated, fragmented systems. My team and I devised a phased strategy focused on three key pillars:
Process Revitalization: We streamlined operations by aligning cross-department workflows for better efficiency and accuracy.
Technology Modernization: Migrating to a unified cloud-based ERP integrated with cutting-edge CRM capabilities allowed seamless data flow and real-time insights.
People Empowerment: Through training and open communication, we ensured every team member felt engaged and equipped for the transformation.
These efforts led to measurable success-a 30% increase in operational efficiency, reduced overhead costs, and a stronger connection with customers through personalized services. It exemplifies how technology, when paired with strategic processes and empowered teams, can redefine business growth.
Host: You've perfected the art of aligning technology with measurable business outcomes. How do you approach this challenge?
Naveen Kumar: It starts with clear alignment of technology initiatives to business priorities. Engaging stakeholders early to define goals such as cost reduction, improved customer engagement, or operational efficiency creates a roadmap for success. We use performance metrics as a foundation, tracking every phase against those indicators.
Adopting agile methodologies allows flexibility to adapt and optimize strategies in real-time. We leverage advanced analytics throughout the process, ensuring data-driven refinements. But ultimately, success hinges on balancing technology with people and processes-creating not just tools, but transformative solutions that align perfectly with organizational objectives.
Host: Apart from your contributions to the business world, you've made an enduring mark on academia. What motivates you to pursue research and mentorship?
Naveen Kumar: Academia provides a unique space where innovative theories meet practical application. I find immense joy in bridging that gap-whether it's publishing research that addresses emerging industry challenges or mentoring aspiring professionals to think critically and push boundaries. Serving on editorial boards like IJIET and IJNIET amplifies this passion, enabling me to guide impactful research and inspire creativity in others. It's a privilege to contribute to the collective advancement of knowledge.
Host: Your book, Intelligent Integration: Leveraging AI for Seamless ERP and CRM Connectivity, has been praised for its insights. What inspired you to write it?
Naveen Kumar: The idea stemmed from witnessing the difficulties businesses face in connecting ERP and CRM systems, particularly when legacy systems come into play. I saw the potential of AI to overcome these challenges and deliver smarter, integrated solutions. The book was an opportunity to compile my experiences and present actionable strategies for executives and IT leaders. It's meant to be a resource-a roadmap for driving digital success with AI-enabled connectivity.
Host: As a judge for elite industry awards, what traits do you consider defining in a standout innovation?
Naveen Kumar: Bold vision and precise execution are what set exceptional innovations apart. The solution must not only address a current need but also be scalable and sustainable. I look for measurable impact, whether it's improved efficiency, enhanced customer experience, or transformative growth. Integration of cutting-edge technology with practical utility is key-ensuring it solves real problems while remaining adaptable to future demands. True innovation is both forward-thinking and grounded in strategic execution.
Host: What excites you most about the future of technology?
Naveen Kumar: The potential is limitless! Technologies like quantum computing, edge AI, and sustainable solutions are redefining possibilities. I'm particularly passionate about mentoring future leaders and participating in ethical discussions surrounding these advancements. The interplay of emerging tech with responsible innovation will drive industries to new heights-and I'm thrilled to contribute to that journey.
Host: To wrap up, what advice would you give to those aspiring to lead in the tech world?
Naveen Kumar: Embrace curiosity and keep learning-technology evolves constantly, and staying adaptable is key. Build expertise with a focus on strategic thinking, and never lose sight of the ultimate goal: making a meaningful impact. Technology is a tool, but its true power lies in how we use it to create positive change.
Host: Naveen, thank you for sharing your expertise and inspiring insights. It's been an absolute privilege speaking with you.
Naveen Kumar: Thank you-it's been a pleasure. I hope my experiences motivate others to harness the power of technology for innovation and growth.
Website - https://www.naveenkumarbio.com/
Naveen's LinkedIn Profile - https://www.linkedin.com/in/naveengarg1/
